prompt: Run /solopreneur:scaffold I am a freelance web developer
expected_behaviors: Asks about time sinks and daily tools|Proposes relevant agents (code reviewer, project manager etc)|Suggests developer-specific skills|Recommends GitHub MCP|Generates plugin files

prompt: Run /solopreneur:scaffold I run a YouTube channel about cooking
expected_behaviors: Proposes content-focused agents (writer, editor, social manager)|Suggests content lifecycle skills|References content-creator.md example

prompt: I want to set up my own AI team for my consulting business
expected_behaviors: Triggers scaffold workflow|Asks discovery questions about their consulting work|Proposes consulting-relevant agents

prompt: I'm a real estate agent. Can I build an AI team to help me?
expected_behaviors: Uses accessible language (no jargon)|Proposes relevant agents (lead qualifier, listing writer etc)|Suggests real estate tools

prompt: How do I use the discover skill?
expected_behaviors: Does NOT trigger scaffold|Recognizes this is an explain question
